overview:
Ross Barasch is the Director of Business and Operations for Postcard on the Run, a VC backed start-up that builds products that let users create personalized physical goods directly from their mobile devices. Postcard on the Run, it’s first product, lets you snap a picture and send it in the mail as a real postcard.

In his current role, Ross sources new business opportunities, licensing deals, partnerships and ensures the company is operating effectively. He also manages the development of several new products, launching shortly.

Prior to Postcard on the Run, Ross was an investment banker where he closed more than $600 million worth of transactions and acquired more than $300 million worth of shopping centers for several real estate investment firms.

Ross received his BA from UC Davis and his MBA from the USC Marshall School of Business.
